title: Thoreau Gardens- September opening for a one bedroom
posting_body: One bedroom one bathroom on Thoreau Street in Concord Center.
Just a short walk to the commuter rail, library, restaurants, and Crosby’s marketplace.
This first-floor corner apartment has gleaming hardwood floors, a spacious galley kitchen with plenty of cabinets and a nostalgic charm.
Additional storage, coin operated laundry facility, and assigned parking available.
Gas heat, hot water, sewer, trash/snow removal and landscaping included in the rent.
Superb commuter location, minutes to Routes 2, 128, 117.
Easy walk to charming Concord shops, eateries and commuter rail to Boston.
Located in picturesque and historic Concord.
Easy commute - Nearby towns: Lexington, Acton, Bedford, Lincoln, Sudbury, Wayland, Waltham, Westford.
Lease terms:
$1,700 per month for a minimum of a 12-month lease.
$2,100 per month for a minimum of a 9-month lease.
No pets.
No smoking.
Qualification Standards:
Good credit & clean criminal background.
Minimum net income: $58,285 per year on a 12-month lease (not applicable for section 8 applicants).
Good references.
This apartment is presently occupied.
Therefore, we are not showing it at this time.
All interested parties must email their full name, names of all other occupants, and phone number for more information on the first available day of showing.
*Pictures and floor plan are of a sample unit and should be used as an example only*
